prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a giant trash monster with colorful decorations.
I want a unique Pokemon inspired by urban waste, featuring bright splashes of color.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that represents pollution but with a quirky personality.
Make a Pokemon that has a body made of garbage with vibrant accents and arms.
Imagine a Pokemon with a messy look, resembling a heap of trash but with charm.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of waste and nature, showcasing distinct colors.
Give me a Pokemon that stands out with a playful yet messy appearance.
